FuncDef: The IP address corresponding to the GMPLS loopback address configured on the LMP peer. Ifpeer-loopback-addressis entered, then this is used as the routable peer address, otherwise thepeer-node-idis assumed to correspond to a routable peer loopback.

ParaDef.Info: The GMPLS control plane loopback address of the IPCC next-hop. Values-ipv4-address - a.b.c.d.
